name: Piki Piki
description:
Story:

Santa dropped his gifts in a volcano, he sent you (against your will) into the volcano to retrieve these precious gifts.

 Unfortunately, when you arrive at the bottom of the volcano, it wakes up, hurry up if you don't want to end up as a cooked penguin.

Original soundtrack by:
RoleMusic & Sawsquarenoise(Press P while in game to pause the music, and R to resume it.)
